DOC.brief_summary: we aim to compare the analgesic effect of 0.125% bupivacaine HCL, 0.125% bupivacaine HCL + Morphine sulphate 3 mg, 0.125% bupivacaine HCL + Fentanyl 100 micro gram both at rest and mobilization maneuvers.
DOC.brief_title: Postoperative Epidural Analgesia in Spine Fusion Surgery
DOC.criteria: patients undergoing spine fusion surgery. Drug addiction. Intraoperative dural tear. Uses of opioids drug for any reason in the previous 48 hours. Mental dysfunction. Spinal fusion for any infectious or malignant causes.
